channel.title: CVE Feed for Ocean Data Systems -- Dream Report 2023
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ocean Data Systems -- Dream Report 2023

item.title: CVE-2024-6618|2024-08-20T16:31:02.999Z -- ocean%20data%20systems -- dream%20report%202023
item.description: In Ocean Data Systems Dream Report, a path traversal vulnerability could allow an attacker to perform remote code execution through the injection of a malicious dynamic-link library (DLL).

item.title: CVE-2024-6618|2024-08-13T16:37:41.654Z -- ocean%20data%20systems -- dream%20report%202023
item.description: In Ocean Data Systems Dream Report, a path traversal vulnerability could allow an attacker to perform remote code execution through the injection of a malicious dynamic-link library (DLL).

item.title: CVE-2024-6619|2024-08-13T16:41:03.858Z -- ocean%20data%20systems -- dream%20report%202023
item.description: In Ocean Data Systems Dream Report, an incorrect permission vulnerability could allow a local unprivileged attacker to escalate their privileges and could cause a denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6619|2024-08-14T14:37:29.108Z -- ocean%20data%20systems -- dream%20report%202023
item.description: In Ocean Data Systems Dream Report, an incorrect permission vulnerability could allow a local unprivileged attacker to escalate their privileges and could cause a denial-of-service.
